# maxVertexAmplificationCount

**Instance Property**

Determines the maximum value that can you can pass as the pipeline’s amplification count.

## Declaration

```swift
var maxVertexAmplificationCount: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property controls the maximum count you pass to [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4RenderCommandEncoder/setVertexAmplificationCount:viewMappings:] when using vertex amplification with this pipeline.
